medical_history.chief_complaint: Bilateral hip pain in an eleven-year-old Hispanic male.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began eighteen months prior to presentation, with worsening pain in the lateral part of the left hip, radiating to the knee, and aggravated by running. No antecedent trauma, fever, or morning stiffness was reported.
medical_history.family_history: A great-grandfather reportedly had ‘hip problems’ but was otherwise healthy.
